Portal is a great game. Even though Chell has no dialogue, it still feels like she's a relatable character. I always enjoy GLaDOS dialogue and insults, and the puzzles can be fun and challenging. The only problem I had with the game was I sometimes felt vertigo from going through portals too fast, so be warned!

Portal has earned a place on my permanent list of games that helped define this era of the industry. When the last of the lumbering behemoth mega studios finally implodes under the weight of its own logistics and administration, I will hold Portal up as living proof that you can make a game that changes everything for very little time, money, and personnel. All you need is imagination, diligence, and an understanding of scope.
It's Portal, play it.  You'll love it, end of story.

After finally replaying this favorite of mine, I must really say that it still shines, even after the release of it's bigger, more ambitious sequel. It is just as funny and brillant as before. I even put in some time to unlock some of the achievements I had yet to earn, and complete some of the challenge maps my less intelligent former self never was able to. Altogether, I would say Portal stands resolute among my top ten favorite games of all time. 

HOWEVER: The game is amazing, but it is also quite short in length. It's brevity is the only issue I have with it though.

Como la mayoría de los juegos de Valve, es un grandísimo juego. Simplemente una obra maestra. Con una amplia selección de puzzles que te obligan a pensar y que al lograr resolver te dan un gran sentido de recompensa. Además que se puede esperar de un juego que tiene una de las mejores arma/herramienta de toda la historia.
Warp it up!
great game
Yet another disappointment from valve. I don't understand why it became a success.

This game pretty much started the increasing popularity of the First Person Puzzle game, where to progress, you had to THINK your way through problems rather than SHOOT them! Set in the Half Life universe with minimal plot (at least compared to Portal 2) and a gameplay mechanic involving a device that allows portals that allow the player to quickly walk through them and move between one point and another.

Adapted from a DigiPen game project and with added challenge after completing the main story, this should provide your brain with a workout and much amusement for hours. (in total, depending on individual attention span)
This game is a masterpiece, and in certain aspects surpasses what Portal 2 achieves. Both are amazing in their own right, and as such this is a must buy.

敵を殺すのではなく、道を作る為に撃つゲーム

・・・と綺麗にまとめたいところだけど、そうとは限らなかったりする
Отличная игра головоломка с видом так сказать из глаз)) Интересная идея....интересные задачи...интересная главная злодейка(веселила всю игру) Советую.

Very short, I've beaten the main story in 3-4 hours.

In the main story there are only about 2 maps that are moderately difficult, everything else is very simple. The second part of the story (once your 'testing' is over) is quite repetitive and somewhat boring. The story is interesting, even though simple. The dialogue humor is quite fine, occasionally a bit cheesy. The final credits are very creative.

There are 6 advanced maps available after you finish the main story. They are finally a better challenge. It took me about 2 hours to complete them.

I have a feeling that this game could have been much more interesting if more mechanics/object types were added to the game.

I'd recommend this game for two or three dollars (it's often discounted), but not for the full price probably.

I love this game. The gameplay is very simple, yet it is fun to play. The puzzles are quite eazy to solve. You will sure have lot's of fun in this game. The storyline is told in the an engaging way by making you discover hidden places in order to proceed, such that you can put the story together like a puzzle piece. The turrets may be dangerous but they are cute. :3
This game describe objectum sexuality very well such that I have somewhat fallen in love with the companion cube <3. It feels like the game itself is testing on you, as though as someone in valve is monitoring your game. Also, Glados may be a robot but she seems too human [spoiler]or maybe she is?[/spoiler].
Overall, just get this game. This is problably one of the best single-player game so far. If you like it, you should try portal 2.

Un clasico moderno se mire por donde se mire, aunque no es el primer juego que implementa un sistema de portales, la sencillez de su planteamiento, convierte a este juego de puzzle, plataformas en primera persona en un juego con una rejugabilidad altisima, ya sea por el reto de repetir las camaras (ya que el propio juego te proporciona sus versiones avanzadas con la difucultad aumentada) o por buscar los pequeños detalles que nos ofrece el argumento.

Graficamente utiliza el conocidisimo motor source de Valve que aunque los años ya pesan sobre el creo que ofrece un estandar grafico mas que aceptable y asumible por practicamente cualquier odenador con menos de 8 años, en cuanto al apartado sonoro solo por el tema final "Still Alive" se merece un 10

Nota: 9/10 (me quedo personalmente con la segunda parte ya que esta mas cuidada visualmente y argumentalmente esta mas desarollado, pero no seria posible su existencia sin este titulo como garantia me lo habre hecho unas 6 veces contando esta ultima que me he decidido a comprarlo original con las rebajas de otoño, compra obligadisima)
Von der Dauer her zu kurz, aber trotzdem ein tolles Game ^^

¡¡ESTE JUEGO NO PUEDE FALTAR EN TU BIBLIOTECA!! Un juego inteligente, divertido, desafiante y espectacular... Una joya, sin lugar a dudas. En unos años será considerado un clásico por los aficionados a los videojuegos, si no lo es ya... La única pega que le veo es que se hace un poco corto.
En serio, aprovecha las ofertas de Otoño, Navidad, Halloween o cualquier festividad que lleve asociadas ofertas en Steam... y hazte (a ser posible) con Portal y Portal 2. Muy recomendable jugar a la primera parte antes de la segunda, aunque no es imprescindible.

This awesome game is mostly hard, but it is the real magic of this game. You must turn on your brain and think. Sometimes I had problems too, but it isn't hard solve them. This game is simply fantastic and I hope, that second continue will be yet better. Sound in the background on the end of game is beautiful. I recommend this game for all people. I'm finished the game for 3 hours and is quite short. At least you must try it. :)

(Tahle úžasná hra je většinou těžká, ale to je to pravé kouzlo této hry. Musíte zapnout mozek a myslet. Někdy jsem měl problémy i já, ale není těžké je vyřešit.  Tato hra je jednoduše fantastická a doufám, že druhé pokračování bude ještě lepší. Zvuk v pozadí na konci hry je krásný. Doporučuju tuto hru všem lidem.  Hru jsem dokončil za 3 hodiny a je docela krátká. Aspoň si ji musíte vyzkoušet. :))
